task.title: How to Add Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for using your calculator app. to add numbers.

prereq.p: To successfully add numbers, you must understand addition.

result.p: The result from the addition is displayed.

taskbody.example:
Example:
You want to add 1 and 2. The equation will look like 1+2=3. Press the 1 button. Press the plus (+) button. Press the 2 button. Press the equals (=) button.
The result, the number 3, will appear on the display.
